description: This feature includes Stock initiation,StockApproval1 and StockApproval2 by System Admin
name: Stock Management Initiation

elements.name: To verify that System admin can set the Stock Limit.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Stock Management and Click on Stock Limit
Enter the value for Approval Limit 1
Click on Submit button for Stock Limit

elements.name: To verify that System admin can initiate the stock successfully

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Stock Management and Click on Stock initiation
Select MFS provider and Enter Reference number and Amount
click on Submit and Confirm button

elements.name: To verify that System admin can successfully approve the stock at level>>1

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Checker1
Navigate to Stock Management and Click on Stock Approval 1
Click on Submit Button
Click on Approve button

elements.name: To verify that System admin can successfully approve the stock at level 2.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Checker2
Navigate to Stock Management and Click on Stock Approval 2
Click on Submit and Approve the Stock at level 2
Navigate to Stock Management and Click on Stock initiation
Select MFS provider and Enter Reference number and Amount
Assert Credit Stock

elements.name: To verify that System admin is able to Initiate Stock Transfer to EA through web.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Stock Management and Stock Transfer to EA
User Select MFS Provider
User Should Enter Reference number
User Should Enter Amount

elements.name: To verify that System admin is able to Initiate Stock Transfer to RA through web.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Stock Management and Stock Transfer to RA
Select MFS Provider
Enter Reference number
Enter Amount
Click on Submit button
Click on Confirm button

elements.name: To verify that System admin can enquire the Stocks through stock enquiry.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Stock Management and Stock Enquiry
Select any Transaction ID from the displayed list
Click on Enquiry Submit button
